attributes.action: denounce any Labour MP asking for a payrise to compensate for loss of expense perks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who demand an increase in salary to compensate for loss of parliamentary expenses have misread public anger. The present Salary is appropriate pay for the  job. Expenses are what they must spend to do the job, not part of their salary. If they don't like the current salary, they can choose to resign immediately!

rejection.details: The PM does not control the actions of all MPs. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or with the relevant political parties.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
